review_title: Excellent school with innovative and professional atmosphere
pros: World's first journalism school, incredible amount of talent among students and faculty, wealth of resources available, everyone has lots of school spirit and is invested in studying/working at the Mizzou j-school
cons: There are so many specialized emphasis areas and positions that sometimes it can be hard to accomplish everything you want to in a particular project because certain things fall under someone else's responsibilities

review_title: The Best Journalism School In the Country
job_title: Higher Education Assistant in Sedalia, MO
pros:
Best Journalism School in the country
Missouri Method - Hands on Learning
Working with high achieving students
cons: Leadership continues to struggle to expand definition of diversity.

job_title: Financial Quality Assurance in Augusta, GA
cons: unrealistic expectations for production, understaffed and poor management.
